page.title: 04Church Army - Captain Rouse
page.content: Captain Rouse is one of the best known characters in Darfield. He belongs to the Church Army and has been a member for 7 years. His mission is going round Darfield visiting people with problems, especially old people. He likes to walk on his rounds but also uses a bicycle. Only when it rains does he use his car, so he is very fit. He is an interesting man to talk to and enjoys meeting people but he feels quite sad when he visits people who are going to die because he can do very little about it. He is an ideal person to be a church officer because he is one of the most caring, helpful and friendly people I have ever met.
